name: items
description: The items within the select component.

params.name: value
params.description: Value for the option. If this is omitted, the value is taken from the text content of the option element.

params.name: selected
params.description: Whether the option should be selected when the page loads. Takes precedence over the top-level `value` option.

params.name: disabled
params.description: Sets the option item as disabled.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the option.

name: value
description: Value for the option which should be selected. Use this as an alternative to setting the `selected` option on each individual item.

name: disabled
description: If `true`, select box will be disabled. Use the `disabled` option on each individual item to only disable certain options.

name: describedBy
description: One or more element IDs to add to the `aria-describedby` attribute, used to provide additional descriptive information for screenreader users.

name: label
description: The label used by the select component.

name: hint
description: Can be used to add a hint to the select component.

name: errorMessage
description: Can be used to add an error message to the select component. The error message component will not display if you use a falsy value for `errorMessage`, for example `false` or `null`.

name: formGroup
description: Additional options for the form group containing the select component.

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the form group (for example to show error state for the whole group).

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the form group.

params.name: beforeInput
params.description: Content to add before the select used by the select component.

params.name: text
params.description: Text to add before the select. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: HTML to add before the select. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: afterInput
params.description: Content to add after the select used by the select component.

params.name: text
params.description: Text to add after the select. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: HTML to add after the select. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the select.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the select.
